articles.title: Confirmed: Leon S. Kennedy is in Resident Evil Requiem, PlayStation Store Leak Reveals - IGN
articles.description: At long last, Leon S. Kennedy has been confirmed to appear in Resident Evil Requiem — via a leaked image on the PlayStation Store.

articles.title: UK Charts: Metroid Prime 4 Debuts Behind Mario Kart World And EA Sports FC 26 - Nintendo Life
articles.description: While Octopath Traveler 0 almost doesn't chart at all

articles.title: Your Google Play Points might be hiding a secret $200 Pixel 10 Pro discount - Android Authority
articles.description: Some Google Play Points users have discovered a secret $200 discount offer on the Pixel 10 Pro and 10 Pro XL hiding in the Perks section.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 and Switch 21.1.0 update out now, patch notes - Nintendo Everything
articles.description: Another system update has been released for both the Nintendo Switch, and Nintendo Switch 2. Version 21.1.0 should be rolling out now. The big N has stricken once again with unspecified adjustments in this update, with the patch notes headliner being more sta…

articles.title: Assassin's Creed Shadows Update To Resolve Switch 2 Crashes And Stability Issues - Nintendo Life
Xbox architect hints at an exciting 2026 for Xbox - Windows Central
articles.description: The Xbox Ally X gets a spotlight, but Jason Ronald’s remarks about Xbox’s legacy and the upcoming 25th anniversary give hope to more backwards compatible games.
